Early Access Review

All the makings of a great game that was well thought out, intuitive, and fun to play. Dawn of the robot empire is just in it’s infancy and only scratching its potential. Please don’t stop developing this little gem because you are really close of giving us a robotron like VR fix.  I also see great potential in your boss battle with the snakebot.

Suggestion to the dev...Imagine the player being able to dispatch robots from all sides while being able to spear the robot, lift him up, take a few blasts and then throw or bash the little bugger into the ground hulk style. Revenge for all those quarters dropped into robotron in VR bliss.

reviewText: Early Access Review\n\nMuch deeper than you realize. Gravity on shots adds to the skill needed. Shield and stick thing is just cool as hell. Havent got past wave 2 yet but I am very impressed. Also the Dev is super involved
Early Access Review\n\nThis is a great retro experience! The interaction with the environement is more than just shooting at stuff. Watch out for those wicked little robot spiders!

Early Access Review

I couldn't help myself, i need to review this game.

This game, while not the prettiest one, really nails that 1950s/60s sci-fi robot vibe , and i love it.

The game is very responsive with good sound design and physics with the staff, shield, and gun too! I once found myself with a meteor shower while in the main screen and just tried whacking them with the staff.

I think this is a great vr introduction game and despite it being repetitive to a point, it holds up very well and im sure the dev(s) will add more content in the future.

Well done you guys, well done.
Early Access Review\n\ngreat atmosphere.  i feel like Han Solo.
